subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Marcus Hellner of Sweden finished the 15-kilometer freestyle in 32 minutes 26.0 seconds, beating Cologna, a fellow Olympic gold medalist, by 11.4 seconds.
snippet: Marcus Hellner of Sweden finished the 15-kilometer freestyle in 32 minutes 26.0 seconds, beating Cologna, a fellow Olympic gold medalist, by 11.4 seconds.
